column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is absolutely my favorite tapas in the city.  The atmosphere is SO incredibly fun and lively.  This is a great place for a first date
column3: any type of celebration or just a regular night out.  It is definitely best to come with a larger (4+ people) group so you can try all sorts of dishes.  Everything here is delicious.  Some of my favorites include the spicy potatoes
column6: roasted dates with bacon and skewered chicken.  The sangria is AMAZING.  I have literally had all types (classic
